properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.poll-rate
properties.description: The interval at which the scheduler checks for new tasks in seconds.

properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.poll-abandoned-triggers
properties.description: The interval at which to check for abandoned triggers in seconds.

properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.timers-enabled
properties.description: If the times are enabled or not. Default true.

properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.max-threads
properties.description: The number of threads to use; set to 0 to disable task processing.

properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.trigger-timeout
properties.description: The maximum time allowed for a task and scheduler to complete a task. Defaults to 5 minutes.

properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.poll-awaiting-trigger-timeout
properties.description: The interval at which the system checks for abandoned tasks, in seconds. Defaults to every 5 minutes.

properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.scheduler-enabled
properties.description: Indicates whether this node should handle triggers.

properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.thread-factory
properties.description: Which thread factory should be used DEFAULT or VIRTUAL.

properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.history.delete-rate
properties.description: The interval at which old triggers are deleted, in hours. Default 24h.

properties.name: spring.persistent-tasks.history.delete-after
properties.description: The max age for a trigger in the hstory. Default is PT72H, 30 days.
